summary: In the great mod Dynamic Things - Woodpiles and Barrels and More Oh My by Dominoid the training dummies are not working with training values less than 100%... And effectively only 100%, 200%, 300%, ..., 1000% work... I fixed it :)
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5]New version is out! Go and get it: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54116/]Enhanced Dynamic Things[/url][/size][/b]

This patch here, still works! But the Enhanced version has more things to offer ;)

In the great mod "Dynamic Things - Woodpiles and Barrels and More Oh My" by Dominoid the training dummies are not working with training values less than 100%... And effectively only 100%, 200%, 300%, ..., 1000% work... I fixed it :)

I just had to change the 2 scripts which are attached to the dummies. I changed and recompiled them. Thus, you need the original mod by Dominoid which can be found here:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32448/

[s]I don't know whether this only effects newly converted dummies or all, since I have no clue how the scripting system of Skyrim works in detail.[/s]
I tested it and for me it worked for all dummies, also for already converted.
author: FleischHals
